name: Rum Lord
movement: climb 10 ft., walk 20 ft., swim 10 ft.
description: The Rum Lord is a small, chaotic fey with a vibrant personality, embodying the intoxicating powers of drunkenness. It wields an Ale Tap Scepter and a Broken Bottle Shiv, making it a colorful and dangerous opponent in close combat.
memorable: With its Aura of Drunkenness and the ability to summon rum gremlins, the Rum Lord creates chaotic encounters that can incapacitate its foes.
goals: To spread chaos and intoxication among enemies and to revel in the effects of its drunken powers.
relations: Often associated with other chaotic fey and spirits, particularly those that enjoy revelry and intoxication.
environment: Found in places of merriment or chaos, such as taverns, parties, or wild celebrations.
strengths: Resilient against magical effects due to Magic Resistance; can incapacitate enemies with its Aura of Drunkenness.
weaknesses: Struggles against effects targeting Wisdom due to a low Wisdom score.
attacks: Utilizes melee attacks that include an Ale Tap Scepter for bludgeoning damage and a Broken Bottle Shiv for piercing damage, along with additional poison damage against poisoned foes.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Drunkenness, which poisons enemies within its radius and hampers their movement.
equipment: Ale Tap Scepter and Broken Bottle Shiv.
senses: Darkvision allows it to see in low light up to 120 feet.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and Intimidation, making it effective in physical confrontations and social interactions.
additional_information: Can innately cast Prestidigitation and Command spells at will
Can call rum gremlins to aid in battle for a limited duration
Rotgut Belch attack covers targets in debilitating bile
Aura of Drunkenness gives disadvantage to certain saving throws
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting centered on Charisma; can perform minor magical effects and command other creatures.
test_queries: small chaotic fey with poison abilities
rum lord ability to debilitate foes
monster that uses drunkenness as a weapon
fey that casts spells and fights in melee
